description:
Tree Preservation Application At:

38 – 48 Compton Road, Islington, London, N1 2PB

TPO Reference:

T 2 – Horse Chestnut of LBI TPO (NO.321) 2007
T 4 – Lime of LBI TPO (NO.321) 2007
T 5 – Lime of LBI TPO (NO.321) 2007
T 6 – Lime of LBI TPO (NO.321) 2007
T 7 – Lime of LBI TPO (NO.321) 2007
T 8 – Lime of LBI TPO (NO.321) 2007
T 9 – Lime of LBI TPO (NO.321) 2007
 
PO Number:

T090490

Work specifications:

1 x Horse Chestnut (T2) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.321) 2007
Remove two lowest lateral limbs 
Crown thin by a maximum of 15% and remove deadwood

1 x Lime (T4) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.321) 2007
Crown lift to 3.5m above ground level
Crown thin by a maximum of 15% and remove deadwood

1 x Lime (T5) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.321) 2007
Crown reduce to the previous points of reduction
Crown thin by a maximum of 15% and remove deadwood

1 x Lime (T6 & T7) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.321) 2007
Crown lift to 3.5m above ground level
Crown thin by a maximum of 15% and remove deadwood
Draw in the sides by the lateral crown reduction to the previous points.

1 x Lime (T8 & T9) as detailed in TPO plan of LBI TPO (No.321) 2007
Crown lift to 3.5m above ground level
Crown thin by a maximum of 15% and remove deadwood
